channel.title: Temperature on COTTON
channel.description: Recent content in Temperature on COTTON

item.title: GhCKI
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhCKI Gene Name: Gossypium hirsutum Casein kinase I Genome: TM-1 reference genome TM-1 Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhCKI DNA methylation are all involved in HT-induced male sterility in cotton.

item.title: GhDREB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhDREB1 Gene Name: DREB-like transcription factor Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton GhDREB1 increases plant tolerance to low temperature and is negatively regulated by gibberellic acid.

item.title: GhMT3a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhMT3a Gene Name: Metallothionein-like Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton metallothionein GhMT3a, a reactive oxygen species scavenger, increased tolerance against abiotic stress in transgenic tobacco and yeast.

item.title: GhMYB4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ghir_A12G003840 Gene Symbol: GhMYB4 Gene Name: Genome: TM-1 reference genome TM-1 Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: In the tapetum of early-stage cotton anthers, upregulated expression of GhMYB4 under HT and overexpressed GhMYB4 under normal temperature both led to severe male sterility phenotypes, coupled with enhanced expression of GhCKI.
